\subsection{dy\_dx}
${}$
\begin{lstlisting}
 (c - nu)*D^3*b + (nu*c - c^2 - b^2 - 1)*D^2*b + (c + c*b^2 - c*d + d*nu)*D*b + (d*b^2 - r*b + d)*b

\end{lstlisting}

\subsection{initial\_condition\_from\_central\_frequency}
${}$
\begin{lstlisting}

 for 1D model setups

\end{lstlisting}
